original_text: After this, Jesus went around in Galilee. He did not want to go about in Judea because the Jewish leaders there were looking for a way to kill him.
korean_text: 그 후에 예수께서 갈릴리에서 다니시고 유대에서 다니려 아니하심은 유대인들이 죽이려 함이러라

sentences.original_text: He did not want to go about in Judea
because Jewish leaders there were looking for a way
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그곳의 유대 지도자들이 방법을 찾고 있었기 때문이다
